events.text:
The Boggle is twice dead. Slay!
Go talk to [color=#38f5bc]Archdemon Maldoror[/color].

AHHHH YOU SCARED ME SILLY!!!!!
I don't know who you are, mortal...
or how you managed to sweet talk that [color=#08ff00]egghead Knight[/color] outside...
but trust me when I assure you that I am no disturbance...

(Stay calm... this mortal is an idiot after all)
Who am I? WHO AM I?????
Why... I am the monster under your bed!
I am Boggle!

In my business, animals of the bovine variety are as valuable as they come.
Did you know [color=#08ff00]Princess Coldheart's Kingdom[/color] used to be a bustling farm?
This was before she fainted and fell into a deep, eternal sleep...
The powerful soil and mulch under the [color=#08ff00]Coldheart Castle Keep[/color] froze with her.
That's why I infested this church... 
I intend to stay here and build an [color=#ffc740]Army of Unusual Oxen[/color].

Correct. 
Tell me... have you spoken to that useless [color=#38f5bc]Archdemon Maldoror[/color] who watches from the doorway to [color=#08ff00]Coldheart Castle Keep[/color]?
What a poor excuse for a leader. No wonder this town is so DEAD!
If Boggle was in charge, it would really spice things up around here.

Ahh, my newest recruits. Emphasis on "unusual".... what did you say?
I need to learn the definition of "Oxen"?!
Oh, I see. You're not as stupid as you look, mortal!
There was another mortal that came here before you and said the same thing.
[color=#38f5bc]Archdemon Maldoror[/color] weakened this tiny mortal's mind. 
That tiny mortal is the reason the [color=#08ff00]Coldheart Knight[/color] locked the church!

I am growing tired of this idle chit-chat.
I'm angry about that tiny mortal who discarded my generous offer as easily as a soul drops a dead body.
If you care at all about my mission and want to see these mortals safe and sound...
Find the Curious Serpent and tell it:
"I turn away my eyes and stare into the horizon that flees before our approach." All will be revealed.
To sweeten the deal, I'll grant you an honorific title AND grant you one special wish... within reason, of course.

How BRAVE of you, mortal...
"Never mind" this, "never mind" that...
Come back and visit when you feel like having a conversation.
Come back and visit when you feel like having a conversation.
